channel.title: CiTR -- Generation Annihilation
channel.description: Generation Annihilation is a weekly Punk show, which has been in existence since late 2001. We try to cover all angles of the genre but try to stray away from stuff normally heard on Commercial radio. We try to keep up to date with new releases be it newly recorded material or stuff being re-issued. crashnburnradio@yahoo.ca
channel.itunes:summary: Generation Annihilation is a weekly Punk show, which has been in existence since late 2001. We try to cover all angles of the genre but try to stray away from stuff normally heard on Commercial radio. We try to keep up to date with new releases be it newly recorded material or stuff being re-issued. crashnburnradio@yahoo.ca
